website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for runners with the ability to track and aggregate performance over a period of weeks. Also features sleep and recovery tracking.
pros: Well-rounded heart rate monitor and GPS Suunto watch

customer_reviews.title: This is an AMAZINGwatch. There is an astounding amount of data ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING watch. There is an astounding amount of data that it provides, including pace, speed, cadence, etc. However, what I appreciate most is altitude and this is what sets the watch apart. If you run trails or roads, you will have inclines and some are steep. Of course, they impact your pace/speed. It's good to look back at your run and assess the impact of the incline on your performance, which can aid in training. My only concern is that I know there are far more features than I use daily (I just choose which exercise I'm about to embark upon and go).
customer_reviews.author: Counsellor

customer_reviews.title: Another Excellent Suunto Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for a little over a month and use it regularly. No complaints. Battery life is good, Movescount App works great (Android) and the GPS has worked every time with minimal delay. This is my 2nd Suunto Watch (I have the Vector) and really like their products.
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: Just like others have mentioned the strap is the weak link
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have mentioned the strap is the weak link. I worked as an Hydraulics engineer and dealt with various Elastomers and rubber materials for different types of hydraulic seals. For Suunto to provide a strap that can't handle sweat and body oils is just unacceptable.The customer service is terrible at best. The watch does not keep precise time as well. Finally, from a cost vs value perspective- there is a big gap.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Solid running watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch so far. It's big but it doesn't get in the way while running. It has everything I need to track my runs and some fun apps. The gps is reliable accurate. It doesn't have as many bells and whistles as the peak or sports but hey, I didn't want to pay for bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Veey good! Been using it for my runs of late
customer_reviews.text: Veey good! Been using it for my runs of late, GPS works very well. It will take some tinkering before you'd fully understand the watch but I'm pretty much satisfied. I just hope future Ambits will be chunkier and sport bigger faces/display for those reading-glasses peeps who do not want bring their glasses with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rico from Manila

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m happy with it. Still don’t know how to use most of the stuff but what I can use it’s very good. For the price I’ve got it best on the market. The mobile app helps a lot. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Super Watch - All Around Winner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. The whole Suunto system is top notch. I've paired it with a Scosche Rhythm+ heart rate monitor and this system is fantastic. High quality watch all around. The silicone strap is fantastic and ultra comfortable. Lime green looks great for exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Too big for my wrist but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Too big for my wrist but I don’t mind. The problem with Suunto has always been the quality of the straps. They always break sooner than later but this model seems more sturdy than the Quest model I used to wear. GPS connectivity is ver fast and accurate. Nice on a girl as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: A good value at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A good value at a good price. Does everything that I need. An oddity that I haven't yet figured out is that it will show laps and pace only in a defined distance in meters but can be made to show distance in miles.Results on the website can be made to show everything in miles. It requires some getting used to while running.
customer_reviews.author: Moose Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Great battery life. (Over 10 days) Smart features can be a bit flaky but the heart monitor is awesome and very accurate. (Much more than Fitbit or Apple Watch)The ability to write programs and upload is very cool. The watch itself is just cool looking and very comfortable. I wear it 24/7. The gps, accelerometer and gps altitude is also great! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: kerm

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for avid runners.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gf who trains for and runs marathons year around. She loved it. I was worried it might be a bit too bulky and heavy for her since she's quite thin, but she doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Go Bears

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, less intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Not that intuitive. Will take a lot of time to get used to the fearures.
customer_reviews.author: tsg666

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Sync Activities to App on Phone
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get the Suunto. I was making a brave switch from Garmin. I had real issues with the heart rate monitor and could not sync my cativities to the Suunto app. Great looking sports watch but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michael hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! It's used daily and Ive never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: TFrank

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for people with regular exercise who also wanna look good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she loves it. Looks very modern and elegant and works like a charm so far for her. Totally worth the money. Their app/website could be better but it would be unfair to blame the product for this.
customer_reviews.author: Pid

customer_reviews.title: but it's rather annoying.
customer_reviews.text: There was no heart rate monitor included. Also they sent a different watch than the Ambit3 Run... I suppose it will work, but it's rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it precisely tracks your running without it being so bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch. I was very excited to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. I was very excited to use the watch and wasn't disappointed with the features. The phone app could use some modifications, however the watch on its own gives you enough information.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. For the price it should do a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Like the tracking for swimming Would like to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Like the tracking for swimming Would like to be able to see time of day while exercising, but pleased with performance
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Kern

customer_reviews.title: Catches GPS signal fast! Works as described,
customer_reviews.text: Suunto products catch a GPS signal almost immediately, and the ultra-modes work great for super long races. Slim design makes it feel like just a normal stop watch. The added blue tooth functionality is the difference maker for me and the reason i upgraded from the Ambit2, otherwise this unit is almost the same as the Ambit2. The "Moves count" computer interface is a little clunky but it works just fine. Looks decent when in normal watch/ time of day mode too for use as a primary watch while on active vacations. I'll never buy a garmin again!
customer_reviews.author: Erik_runnerman

customer_reviews.title: Although it's never easy to sync to strava and isn't that user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This watch has many features. Although it's never easy to sync to strava and isn't that user friendly. I would go back to garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M. Farber

customer_reviews.title: Great heart rate monitor and GPS watch
customer_reviews.text: Great heart rate monitor and GPS watch. I will say that the only constructive criticism I would give Suunto is they way they charge the device. If the clamp does not seat properly on the charging pins on the watch, it will not charge. It's a bit cumbersome. Other than that I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J DeMarce

customer_reviews.title: Love MovesCount for tracking
customer_reviews.text: Alas, a multi-sport watch that is fully-customizable and works flawlessly. I've put about 45 hrs of workouts and I've had no hiccups with either the HR strap or GPS. I range between running, crossfit, indoor cycling, paragliding, trail running, and backcountry skiing... and this watch has done it all. Personally, I prefer GPS-derived altitude since the range of accuracy is higher than the range due to barometric pressure differences. Not too big of a watch, not too small. Love MovesCount for tracking, analyzing, mapping, and customization. Fully recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never using another brand other than Suunto
customer_reviews.text: This watch is PERFECT for trail runners! I've used it in deep wooded areas and haven't lost signal yet. The track back feature gives me peace of mind when I'm running a new trail alone, that if I get lost, it will always bring me back to where I started. It grabs GPS signal within 30 seconds every time, and is the most accurate watch I've owned. Fits my wrist perfectly and doesn't slide around or rub. Would highly recommend spending the little extra money to get Suunto instead of Garmin or Polar.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Wagner

customer_reviews.title: But easily scrached class
customer_reviews.text: GPS works accurately. Really satissfying. But easily scrached class. Strongly needed protection film.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bonus
customer_reviews.text: I was only looking for a watch for running with HRM and GPS. It is a big bonus that i can use to other activities like swimming etc. GPS works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Niice
customer_reviews.text: Great watch use it to run hike and when i ride my bike. Its pretty accurate on the bike and great while running. Great watch
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy yet... unless you only workout outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I am not liking this... YET. I have the Ambit2 and it is what i am still using. As an active athlete that works out indoors in Chicago winters, treadmill and roller work (bike) are a staple. This version of their fine line is BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and it does not have a foot pod, speed/cadence kit or any other meter beyond the heart rate monitor. Multiple calls to Support AND local dealers has not yielded any clue of assistance. I give it two stars because it is still a great watch, but i hold out hope and i would not buy this until they catch up.
customer_reviews.author: Magda's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ultra Runner and the suunto lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a fair price. I like the setting for various sports, running, cycling, swimming etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Durante

customer_reviews.title: By far the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Been a suunto fan for a while. By far the best one yet
customer_reviews.author: Trevon

customer_reviews.title: no bluetooth pairing
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth would not connect to any of 3 different phones. My PC could detect it but not my galaxy edge, my old HTC Droid or an old motorola droid. Connected to my PC just fine by USB but this thing absolutely REQUIRES connection to a smart phone to use it. Returned and got a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Very good, work properly and nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good, work properly and nice. Only one problem and there is I can not connect the watch with the suunto app mobile, maybe it's my phone, the rest all good
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best watch i ever worn, i love the way it feel and all that useful functions available, it look like be pretty solid and i'm sure to use the gps functions several times, i strongly recommend to buy it
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES FELIPE AMADO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome so far. The android app doesn't connect to the watch consistently, but I can get over that as I update the Movescount website constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't new at all, The box and Suunto Ambit3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't new at all, The box and Suunto Ambit3 had wear. Finger prints were everywhere. Sign of Used or opened box before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SUUNTO Ambit3 Run HR Monitor Running GPS Unit
feature_bullets: Follow your running performance during your run and track your average over the last weeks
Afterwards, check your recovery status at any time with a quick recovery test (requires Suunto Smart sensor)
You can also wear the Smart sensor overnight to get a complete picture of your recovery including sleep quality
Connect Ambit3 run to your smartphone for syncing your activities, customizing on the go and seeing calls and notifications on the watch
Add Photos in movement and create a Suunto Movie with the highlights of your Adventure to share with your friends

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
